auditReserves().notice: takes inventory of all tracked assetsalways consolidate to recognized reserves before audit

deposit(uint256,address,uint256).notice: allow approved address to deposit an asset for ROME

excessReserves().notice: returns excess reserves not backing tokens

incurDebt(uint256,address).notice: allow approved address to borrow reserves

manage(address,uint256).notice: allow approved address to withdraw assets

mintRewards(address,uint256).notice: send epoch reward to staking contract

queue(uint8,address).notice: queue address to change boolean in mapping

repayDebtWithROME(uint256).notice: allow approved address to repay borrowed reserves with ROME

repayDebtWithReserve(uint256,address).notice: allow approved address to repay borrowed reserves with reserves

toggle(uint8,address,address).notice: verify queue then set boolean in mapping

withdraw(uint256,address).notice: allow approved address to burn ROME for reserves
